ModMetaData.name: Undergrounders: Deep Fabrics
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod adds two new plants, caveflax and darkstrand. Caveflax is balanced like the vanilla cotton plant, while darkstrand is a genetic variation of devilstrand.\n\nAlso includes a new fabric, fungus leather, which is produced at a tailor bench using raw fungus.
